鏡餅.english: Kagami Mochi - A stack of rice cakes offered to the New Year deity to bring prosperity.

門松.english: Kadomatsu - Pine and bamboo decoration placed at the entrance to welcome the New Year gods.

だるま.english: Daruma - A red round doll symbolizing perseverance and good luck.

年賀状.english: Nengajo - New Year greeting cards sent to express gratitude and wishes for the coming year.

おせち.english: Osechi - Traditional Japanese New Year dishes packed in layered boxes.
